description: The ultra-lightweight option for long summer days, the Runbold Light Pants are built for comfort and freedom of movement. The soft stretch fabric is designed for ultimate next-to-skin comfort, making these pants ideal for a wide range of activities, from a casual sunday hike to a demanding multi-day tour. Pre-shaped knees and an elasticated waistband make the Runbold Light all about comfort, while a PFC-free DWR (durable water repellent) finish and adjustable hem make these pants a versatile option in changeable weather. The super-packable Runbold Light pants are a must-have on your next adventure in the mountains or on the road.
name: Mammut Runbold Light Pants, Reg - Mens
